resources.string: Nagaon govt. boys high senior secondary school, Nagaon

Govt. Boys’ Higher Secondary School, Nagaon was established on 17th November, 1865. It is one of the oldest secondary schools in Assam. Since its establishment, this institution has been playing a vital role in educating the people of the district. The 17th November, 1865 is indeed a red letter day in the history of education of Nowgong. Janmejoy Das was appointed as the first Head Master of this school. He continued his service till 1872. The school has four other teachers besides the Head Master and enrolment of pupils in the first year was no more than twenty three. The first batch of pupils numbering three, appeared at the entrance examination of the Calcutta University in 1870. During ten years from 1870 to 1879 as many as 28 candidates appeared at the entrance examination from this school. Physical training was introduced in this school in 1904 and in 1907, the Annual Sports were held in this school for the first time. The school magazine ‘Udoy’ was published for the first time in 1947. Since the establishment of the Gauhati University in 1948, this school has been under it. The school came to the close of the High School status along with its conversion to a Higher Secondary School in 1959. From the humble beginning with 5 teachers and 23 pupils, it has bloomed into full fledged Higher Secondary school from VI to XII with 46 teachers and 11 non-teaching staffs and about 1000 students. Many facilities and opportunities are now available to the pupils. A well equipped Biotech lab under BLiSS programme of Dept. of Biotechnology and ATL innovative lab under NITI Aayog, Govt. of India were established in the school, through which students can be trained in the field of modern Bio Science as well as in Robotic Science. A large number of pupils enjoy free studentship or scholarships or both under different government schemes and other non-government students’ welfare funds.

Nagaon Govt Boys Higher Secondary School

Nagaon Govt. Boys\' H.S.School was established on 17th Nov.1865. It is proud privilige for me to serve as a Principal of this esteemed institution. As Principal ,my goal is to inspire staff, parents and community to work together to provide education for all round development of students.I look forward to the opportunity to empower our students to reach a great success.It is a matter of pride for us that our staff have involved and successfully implemented a system for educational development of our school. Keeping this in mind, our school family continues to remain committed to achieve both our vision and mission. And I am sure the school will reach greater height in the years to comeWe believe ,our educational app will provide necessary learning materials to students in true manner
Our address:\nNagaon Govt. Boys\' HS School\nBM Road, Nagaon, Assam 782001
